verses.verse: When the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%>, whose land <S%H776><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee, and thou succeedest <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%>, and in their houses <S%H1004><s%>;

Thou shalt separate <S%H914><s%> <S%H8686><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for thee in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

Thou shalt prepare <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee a way <S%H1870><s%>, and divide the coasts <S%H1366><s%> of thy land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth thee to inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, into three parts <S%H8027><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, that every slayer <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8802><s%> may flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thither.

And this is the case <S%H1697><s%> of the slayer <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which shall flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thither, that he may live <S%H2425><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: Whoso killeth <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%> ignorantly <S%H1097><s%> <S%H1847><s%>, whom he hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>;

As when a man goeth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the wood <S%H3293><s%> with his neighbour <S%H7453><s%> to hew <S%H2404><s%> <S%H8800><s%> wood <S%H6086><s%>, and his hand <S%H3027><s%> fetcheth a stroke <S%H5080><s%> <S%H8738><s%> with the axe <S%H1631><s%> to cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%>, and the head <S%H1270><s%> slippeth <S%H5394><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the helve <S%H6086><s%>, and lighteth <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, that he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; he shall flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> of those cities <S%H5892><s%>, and live <S%H2425><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

Lest the avenger <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the blood <S%H1818><s%> <S%H8676><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the slayer <S%H310><s%> <S%H7523><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, while <S%H3588><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> is hot <S%H3179><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him, because the way <S%H1870><s%> is long <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and slay <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him <S%H5315><s%>; whereas he was not worthy <S%H4941><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>, inasmuch as <S%H3588><s%> he hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> him not in time <S%H8543><s%> past <S%H8032><s%>.
Wherefore I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Thou shalt separate <S%H914><s%> <S%H8686><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for thee.

And if the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> enlarge <S%H7337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy coast <S%H1366><s%>, as he hath sworn <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, and give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee all the land <S%H776><s%> which he promised <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>;

If thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all these Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>, to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> ever <S%H3117><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>; then shalt thou add <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8804><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> more for thee, beside these three <S%H7969><s%>:

That innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> be not shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in <S%H7130><s%> thy land <S%H776><s%>, which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and so blood <S%H1818><s%> be upon thee.

But if any man <S%H376><s%> hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8802><s%> his neighbour <S%H7453><s%>, and lie in wait <S%H693><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for him, and rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against him, and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him mortally <S%H5315><s%> that he die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and fleeth <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8804><s%> into one <S%H259><s%> of these <S%H411><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%>:

Then the elders <S%H2205><s%> of his city <S%H5892><s%> shall send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and fetch <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him thence, and deliver <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the avenger <S%H1350><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, that he may die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, but thou shalt put away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the guilt of innocent <S%H5355><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> from Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that it may go well <S%H2895><s%> <S%H8804><s%> with thee.

Thou shalt not remove <S%H5253><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy neighbour's <S%H7453><s%> landmark <S%H1366><s%>, which they of old time <S%H7223><s%> have set <S%H1379><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, which thou shalt inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee to possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8800><s%> it.

One <S%H259><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> shall not rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against a man <S%H376><s%> for any iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, or for any sin <S%H2403><s%>, in any sin <S%H2399><s%> that he sinneth <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, or at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of three <S%H7969><s%> witnesses <S%H5707><s%>, shall the matter <S%H1697><s%> be established <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
If a false <S%H2555><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> rise up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against any man <S%H376><s%> to testify <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8800><s%> against him that which is wrong <S%H5627><s%>;

Then both <S%H8147><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>, between whom the controversy <S%H7379><s%> is, shall stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> and the judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, which shall be in those days <S%H3117><s%>;

And the judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall make diligent <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> inquisition <S%H1875><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and, behold, if the witness <S%H5707><s%> be a false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%>, and hath testified <S%H6030><s%> <S%H8804><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> against his brother <S%H251><s%>;

Then shall ye do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto him, as he had thought <S%H2161><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> unto his brother <S%H251><s%>: so shalt thou put <S%H1197><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And those which remain <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shall henceforth <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> commit <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> no more any <S%H1697><s%> such evil <S%H7451><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> you.

And thine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not pity <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; but life <S%H5315><s%> shall go for life <S%H5315><s%>, eye <S%H5869><s%> for eye <S%H5869><s%>, tooth <S%H8127><s%> for tooth <S%H8127><s%>, hand <S%H3027><s%> for hand <S%H3027><s%>, foot <S%H7272><s%> for foot <S%H7272><s%>.
